20101231140315.000|20101231140317.000|CC1|INVOLVES OFFICERS GOING AROUND  
20101231140317.000|20101231140320.000|CC1|WITH SMALL RADIATION DETECTION  
20101231140320.000|20101231140321.000|CC1|EQUIPMENT.                      
20101231140321.000|20101231140322.000|CC1|IT LOOKS LIKE A CELL PHONE.     
20101231140322.000|20101231140324.000|CC1|YOU CAN PUT IT ON YOUR BELT AND 
20101231140324.000|20101231140325.000|CC1|WALK THROUGH THE CROWD.

20101231140410.000|20101231140411.000|CC1|THAT YOU SEE ON THE STREETS THAT

20101231140417.000|20101231140419.000|CC1|SECURITY CAMERAS IN OFFICE      
20101231140419.000|20101231140420.000|CC1|BUILDINGS.                      
20101231140420.000|20101231140423.000|CC1|SO LET'S SAY A BANK IN NEW YORK,
20101231140423.000|20101231140424.000|CC1|GOLDMAN SACHS OR ANOTHER OF THE 
20101231140424.000|20101231140426.000|CC1|FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS, THEY    
20101231140426.000|20101231140430.000|CC1|WOULD HAVE A REPRESENTATIVE IN  
20101231140430.000|20101231140431.000|CC1|THIS CENTER AND BE MONITORING AT
20101231140431.000|20101231140434.000|CC1|THE SAME LOCATION WHERE THE NYPD
20101231140434.000|20101231140436.000|CC1|IS, THEIR OWN INTERNAL CAMERAS. 
20101231140436.000|20101231140438.000|CC1|IMAGINE THERE'S A TERRORIST     
20101231140438.000|20101231140440.000|CC1|ATTACK AND YOU CAN SEE ON THE   
20101231140440.000|20101231140442.000|CC1|STREET THE NEW YORK CITY POLICE 
20101231140442.000|20101231140443.000|CC1|CAMERAS AND THEN THE TERRORIST  
20101231140443.000|20101231140446.000|CC1|ATTACK PROGRESSES INTO A        
20101231140446.000|20101231140447.000|CC1|BUILDING.                       
20101231140447.000|20101231140447.000|CC1|WELL, THEN YOU JUMP OVER TO THE 
20101231140447.000|20101231140449.000|CC1|PRIVATE SECTOR AND YOU HAVE     
20101231140449.000|20101231140450.000|CC1|SOMEONE FROM THAT BANK          
20101231140450.000|20101231140452.000|CC1|MONITORING THEIR OWN INTERNAL   
20101231140452.000|20101231140453.000|CC1|CAMERAS.                        
20101231140453.000|20101231140454.000|CC1|AND THEN IF THE ATTACK MOVED TO 
20101231140454.000|20101231140456.000|CC1|ANOTHER BUILDING, THEN YOU WOULD
20101231140456.000|20101231140458.000|CC1|GO ON TO THE NEXT PERSON WHO IS 
20101231140458.000|20101231140500.000|CC1|MONITORING THEIR CAMERAS.       
20101231140500.000|20101231140502.000|CC1|ALL AT THE SAME LOCATION.       
20101231140502.000|20101231140504.000|CC1|AND THE CAMERAS ARE ALSO        
20101231140504.000|20101231140505.000|CC1|PROGRAMMED TO RECOGNIZE         
20101231140505.000|20101231140506.000|CC1|PATTERNS.                       
20101231140506.000|20101231140509.000|CC1|SO YOU DON'T JUST HAVE TO WATCH 
20101231140509.000|20101231140509.000|CC1|THEM YOURSELF.                  
20101231140509.000|20101231140510.000|CC1|THE CAMERAS MONITOR THEMSELVES  
20101231140510.000|20101231140512.000|CC1|AND CAN BE PROGRAMMED TO PICK   
20101231140512.000|20101231140515.000|CC1|OUT SPECIFIC PATTERNS LIKE THE A
20101231140515.000|20101231140517.000|CC1|BAG IS LEFT IN FRONT OF A TARGET
20101231140517.000|20101231140518.000|CC1|OF YOUR CHOOSING.               
20101231140518.000|20101231140519.000|CC1|YOU PUT IN A PARTICULARLY       
20101231140519.000|20101231140521.000|CC1|SENSITIVE LOCATION.             
20101231140521.000|20101231140522.000|CC1|NEW YORK STOCK EXCHANGE, TYPE IN
20101231140522.000|20101231140524.000|CC1|I WANT TO BE NOTIFIED, I WANT A 
20101231140524.000|20101231140526.000|CC1|LITTLE ALARM TO GO OFF EVERY    
20101231140526.000|20101231140527.000|CC1|TIME THE CAMERA NOTICES THAT A  
20101231140527.000|20101231140529.000|CC1|BAG HAS BEEN LEFT BY THE NEW    
20101231140529.000|20101231140530.000|CC1|YORK STOCK EXCHANGE FOR, THREE, 
20101231140530.000|20101231140531.000|CC1|FOUR, FIVE MINUTES.             
20101231140531.000|20101231140532.000|CC1|YOU SET THE TIME.

20101231140533.000|20101231140536.000|CC1|>> THEY'VE GOT IT DOWN TO A

20101231140632.000|20101231140633.000|CC1|COLORADO, AREA.                 
20101231140633.000|20101231140634.000|CC1|AND THEY ALSO HAD TO CANCEL

20101231140636.000|20101231140637.000|CC1|INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT THERE IN

20101231140642.000|20101231140644.000|CC1|UP IN ARIZONA.                  
20101231140644.000|20101231140646.000|CC1|PARTICULARLY IN FLAGSTAFF,      
20101231140646.000|20101231140647.000|CC1|ARIZONA.                        
20101231140647.000|20101231140648.000|CC1|REALLY STARTED COMING DOWN HARD 
20101231140648.000|20101231140648.000|CC1|THERE.                          
20101231140648.000|20101231140651.000|CC1|THEY HAD TO CLOSE DOWN TWO MAJOR
